chapter.title: Grading
chapter.para: Your project will be graded on completeness and quality of product. In order for you to receive full credit in each area, it must be a) complete, b) done well, and c) tested. The breakdown of grading will be as follows:

listitem.para: README provided that describes where each requirement satisfied: 10pts
managed schema (i.e., defined in a set of files and explicitly used to coldstart and initialize the database at defined times): 5pts
JPA DAO and JPA O/R Mapping: 25pts
